data.title: Donor Honor Roll
data.meta_description: The Franklin Institute would like to thank the following donors for their generous support in 2023, enabling the Institute’s mission – to inspire a passion for learning about science and technology – to be shared with millions of people here in the Philadelphia community and worldwide through our online and national science education network programs.View the 2023 Year in Review Report PDF
data.text:
The Franklin Institute would like to thank the following donors for their generous support in 2023, enabling the Institute’s mission – to inspire a passion for learning about science and technology – to be shared with millions of people here in the Philadelphia community and worldwide through our online and national science education network programs.

View the 2023 Year in Review Report PDF

Many thanks to the donors for their generous unrestricted, special project, and sponsorship support, and to those who match contributions from their employees:

$200,000+

GSK

Dr. and Mrs. Donald E. Morel, Jr.
